abstract.t: This document specifies instance-related messages to be used in conjunction with the Semantic Definition Format (SDF) for Data and Interactions of Things (draft-ietf-asdf-sdf). Split into four "archetypes", instance-related messages are always governed by SDF models, strictly separating instance and class information. _Context_ information plays a crucial role both for lifecycle management and actual device interaction. // This revision applies a major restructuring, reduces redundancy // and clarifies some of the concepts that are used throughout the // document. It also expands upon three experimental application // scenarios for instance-related messages.
